not_authorized.si: Nimaš dovoljenja za dostop do strani.
not_authorized.en: You don`t have permission to access this page.

error_writting.si: Napaka pri zapisovanju datoteke. Imaš pravice za pisanje?
error_writting.en: Error writing file, do you have writing permissions?

invalid_tournament_config.si: Ne najdem konfiguracijske datoteke za turnirje.

error_creating_tournament_directory.si: Napaka pri zapisovanju mape za turnir.

invalid_password_file_structure.si: Neveljavna struktura datoteke z gesli. Turnir je bil shranjen, datoteka s gesli je bila zavržena.
invalid_password_file_structure.en: Invalid password file structure. Your tournament was uploaded, but your passwords file was discarded.

error_saving_passwords_file.si: Napaka pri zapisovanju datoteke. Turnir je bil shranjen, datoteka z gesli je bila zavržena.
error_saving_passwords_file.en: Password file could not be saved. Your tournament was saved but your passwords file was discarded.

error_reading_passwords_file.si: Napaka pri branju datoteke z gesli.

error_deleting_empty_config.si: Ne morem izbrisati. Konfiguracijska datoteka je prazna.

error_reading_config.si: Napaka pri branju konfiguracijske datoteke turnirjev.

tournament_has_ended.si: Turnir je zaključen, oddaje so zaključene.
tournament_has_ended.en: Tournament has ended, submissions are finished.

empty_submission_password.si: Za oddajo je potrebno vnesti geslo.

error_unzipping_file.si: Napaka pri unzipanju datoteke. Prenos datoteke prekinjen.
error_unzipping_file.en: File upload aborted, unable to unzip folder.

error_reading_source_file.si: Napaka pri branju datoteke glavnega programa.

error_moving_submission.si: Napaka pri shranjevanju oddanih datotek v mapo z oddajami turnirja.
error_moving_submission.en: Error moving file to submission folder.

author_not_found.si: Ne najdem podatkov o avtorju programa. Poskrbi, da tvoja koda vključuje @author značko
author_not_found.en: Author info not found. Make sure you include @author tag in your source code.

no_main_programme_found_so.si: Ne najdem 'glavnega' programa. Poskrbi, da bo v korenski mapi tvoje oddaje java program z 'extends Algorithm(case sensitive!)'.
no_main_programme_found_so.en: No 'main' source file found! Remember to put a java app in the roof folder of your submission that has 'extends Algorithm(case sensitive!)' line.

no_main_programme_found_mo.si: Ne najdem 'glavnega' programa. Poskrbi, da bo v korenski mapi tvoje oddaje java program z 'extends MOAlgorithm(case sensitive!)'.
no_main_programme_found_mo.en: No 'main' source file found! Remember to put a java app in the roof folder of your submission that has 'extends MOAlgorithm(case sensitive!)' line.

error_scanning_source.si: Napaka pri iskanju datoteke glavnega programa.
error_scanning_source.en: Error while scanning for source files.

error_uploading_tmp_folder.si: Napaka pri prenosu datoteke. Ne morem ustvariti mape za razširitev oddane ZIP datoteke.
error_uploading_tmp_folder.en: File upload aborted, unable to create tmp folder for extraction.

invalid_file_format.si: Neveljavna datoteka. Naložiš lahko samo JAVA ali ZIP datoteko.
invalid_file_format.en: Invalid file format, you can only upload JAVA or ZIP files.

error_retrieving_deletion_file.si: Napaka pri pridobivanju oddane naloge za brisanje.
error_retrieving_deletion_file.en: Error retrieving data for file deletion.

error_reading_submission_list.si: Napaka pri branju seznama oddanih nalog.

error_saving_submission_list.si: Napaka pri shranjevanju seznama oddanih nalog.

file_upload_success.si: Datoteka uspešno naložena. Rezultate lahko vidiš tukaj:
file_upload_success.en: File uploaded successfully. You can view results here:

valid_types.si: Opomba: veljavne datoteke so JAVA datoteke ali ZIP datoteke z vašim programom.
valid_types.en: Note: valid file types are JAVA or ZIP containing your source file

delete_submissions_confirmation.si: Si prepričan, da želiš izbrisati to nalogo?Vse pripadajoče datoteke bodo izbrisane!
delete_submissions_confirmation.en: Are you sure you want to delete this tournament submission?All associated files will be removed!

delete_image_confirmation.si: Si prepričan, da želiš izbrisati to sliko?
delete_image_confirmation.en: Are you sure you want to delete this image?

delete_tournament_confirmation.si: Si prepričan,da želiš izbrisati ta turnir?Vse pripadajoče datoteke bodo izbrisane!
delete_tournament_confirmation.en: Are you sure you want to delete the tournament?All associated files will be removed!

submission_being_processed.si: Tvoja oddaja je v obdelavi. Prosim počakaj na rezultate preverjanja.
submission_being_processed.en: Your submission is being processed. Please wait for results.

run_ears_confirm.si: Si prepričan, da želiš zagnati EARS(lahko traja nekaj časa)?
run_ears_confirm.en: Are you sure you want to run EARS(it could take a while)?

run_ears_failed.si: Pri zagonu EARSa je prišlo do napake.
